review: It would be awesome if I didnt have to restart it every once in a while to work properly.  I am not sure if this is related to Amazon fire or Apps I am having problems with ( Hulu/Sling).  Sling used to work well earlier.. however now I am finding myself restarting the entire box once a day.. even then it hangs up in the middle of a show ( doesnt happen with chromecast).  That said.. device is real fast and interface is solid... stability is only thing I am questioning right now.
